As Ke Huy Quan opened the envelope to announce Robert Downey Jr. as the Academy Award winner for Best Supporting Actor in "Oppenheimer," Gwyneth Paltrow, Downey Jr.'s co-star in Iron Man, showed her support on social media — while getting her hair done. https://t.co/R1vyiIaICr pic.twitter.com/Uhh8bSxDFz

item.title: 周一，一名美国男子因在德国著名的新天鹅堡附近残忍袭击两名美国妇女，并将她们推入山谷，造成其中一人致命受伤，被判犯有谋杀罪和其他罪名。他被判处终身监禁。
item.description:
An American man was convicted of murder and other charges on Monday for brutally attacking two American women near Germany's famed Neuschwanstein castle and pushing them into a ravine, fatally injuring one of them.

He was sentenced to life in prison. https://t.co/Lnngifn6Cd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 根据疾病预防控制中心的数据，自大流行开始以来，已有超过 118 万美国人死于 COVID-19。在世界卫生组织宣布 COVID 为大流行病四周年之际，让我们通过数字来看看这种病毒：
item.description:

item.title: "你坐在那里干什么？哦。"麦当娜在演唱会上误认为一位观众没有站起来，然后才意识到这位观众是轮椅使用者。
